data.author: Graham Jones

changelog.release_notes: Fixed memory allocation problem that caused app to fail on Pebble Classic.

Version 2.0 - compatible with V2.0 of the Android Compatible App.
Adds a basic user interface to allow alarms to be muted from the watch, or to raise an alarm manually by pressing and holding the up or down button respectively.
Some other changes ready for a future lower power version of the app that will extend battery life.
Added simple fall detection function to seizure detection app.
Re-compiled to provide compatibility with Pebble Time and Pebble Round - no functional changes from version 1.1.
Updated Pebble Watch App to allow Android Server app to change seizure detector parameters so it can be tuned to optimise response and avoid false alarms.
Experimental version of pebble based seizure detector.    Communicates with companion Android Application to raise alarm to warn carer of seizure.

data.description:
Pebble based epileptic seizure detector to warn a carer that someone is experiencing a tonic-clonic seizure. Uses an associated Application that runs on an Android phone to raise alarms. Version 2 of the App allows the user to mute the alarms if they are doing an activity that would otherwise generate alarms, and to raise an alarm manually (by pressing and holding the UP and DOWN buttons respectively).

 If anyone with a Pebble has an interest in epilepsy, I would appreciate you having a look at this app and feeding back your thoughts!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed memory allocation problem that caused app to fail on Pebble Classic.

data.title: Open_Seizure_Detector
